FlowGraph
Table of Contents

Interface ITypedCoordinateTransformer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Core.Coordinates
Assembly
FlowGraph.Core.dll

Type-safe coordinate transformer that converts between canvas and viewport coordinate spaces.

This interface provides compile-time type safety for coordinate conversions by using distinct types for canvas and viewport coordinates. This prevents accidental mixing of coordinate spaces, which is a common source of bugs in pan/zoom implementations.

Coordinate Space Relationships: 

Viewport → Canvas:  canvas = (viewport - offset) / zoom
Canvas → Viewport:  viewport = canvas * zoom + offset
public interface ITypedCoordinateTransformer
Extension Methods
TypedCoordinateTransformerExtensions.GetVisibleCanvasRect(ITypedCoordinateTransformer, ViewportRect)
TypedCoordinateTransformerExtensions.IsVisible(ITypedCoordinateTransformer, CanvasPoint, ViewportRect)
TypedCoordinateTransformerExtensions.IsVisible(ITypedCoordinateTransformer, CanvasRect, ViewportRect)

Examples

// Type-safe - compiler prevents passing viewport where canvas expected
ViewportPoint viewportPos = coordinates.GetPointerViewportPosition(e);
CanvasPoint canvasPos = transformer.ToCanvas(viewportPos);

// Render something at the canvas position
ViewportPoint renderPos = transformer.ToViewport(canvasPos);
context.DrawEllipse(brush, pen, renderPos.ToAvalonia(), 5, 5);

Properties

OffsetX

The X component of the viewport offset.

double OffsetX { get; }

Property Value

double

OffsetY

The Y component of the viewport offset.

double OffsetY { get; }

Property Value

double

Zoom

The current zoom level (1.0 = 100%).

double Zoom { get; }

Property Value

double

ToCanvas(ViewportVector)

Converts a viewport vector to canvas space. Only applies zoom, not offset (since vectors are relative).
